name: POKO (CubePunks  [Kiage])
description:
Help the Poko Brothers become King of the Nebuzone! Hop above the galactic vortex and reclaim the lost treasure of the fallen empire!

SUPPORT: https://www.playpoko.com

Buy some merch to fun the expansion of the Poko world.

_________

::HOW TO PLAY::

-CONTROLS: 
--Move = WASD / Arrow keys
--Trick = Space bar right when you land

-OBJECTIVE:
--Get as many points as you can before you get a Game Over.

-HOW TO GET POINTS:
--Land on the tiles, 
--Collect the coin,
--Do Tricks

_______

Currently, Only a Desktop Browser build of the game is available. With support we will be able to port it to other platforms, add more features, etc.
